mapper.insert: insert into tp_bank (name, code, thumb, desc, credit_card_desc, recommend_rate, apply_rate, apply_speed, create_at, color, tag, bonus, apply_num, banner, use_bonus, thumb_l, tel, banner_index, jump_url, sort, status, real_apply_num, partner_id, free_day, avg_quota, avg_apply_num, year_fee, free_fee_times, bill_day, apply_need, pass_rate, need_query, background, work_day, school_url, type, nuclear_card, open_url) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{credit_card_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend_rate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{apply_rate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{apply_speed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{apply_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{banner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{use_bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{thumb_l,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{banner_index,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jump_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{real_apply_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{partner_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{free_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avg_quota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avg_apply_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year_fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{free_fee_times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bill_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{apply_need,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pass_rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{need_query,jdbcType=BIT}, #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{work_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{school_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{nuclear_card,jdbcType=BIT}, #{open_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update tp_bank set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumb = #{thumb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, desc = #{desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, credit_card_desc = #{credit_card_desc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recommend_rate = #{recommend_rate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, apply_rate = #{apply_rate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, apply_speed = #{apply_speed,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_at = #{create_at,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, color = #{color,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tag = #{tag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bonus = #{bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, apply_num = #{apply_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, banner = #{banner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, use_bonus = #{use_bonus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, thumb_l = #{thumb_l,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, banner_index = #{banner_index,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jump_url = #{jump_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=TINYINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, real_apply_num = #{real_apply_num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, partner_id = #{partner_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free_day = #{free_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avg_quota = #{avg_quota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, avg_apply_num = #{avg_apply_num,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, year_fee = #{year_fee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, free_fee_times = #{free_fee_times,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bill_day = #{bill_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, apply_need = #{apply_need,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pass_rate = #{pass_rate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, need_query = #{need_query,jdbcType=BIT}, background = #{background,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, work_day = #{work_day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, school_url = #{school_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, nuclear_card = #{nuclear_card,jdbcType=BIT}, open_url = #{open_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, code, thumb, "desc", credit_card_desc, recommend_rate, apply_rate, apply_speed, create_at, color, tag, bonus, apply_num, banner, use_bonus, thumb_l, tel, banner_index, jump_url, sort, status, real_apply_num, partner_id, free_day, avg_quota, avg_apply_num, year_fee, free_fee_times, bill_day, apply_need, pass_rate, need_query, background, work_day, school_url, type, nuclear_card, open_url from tp_bank where id = #{bank_id}

select id, name, code, thumb, "desc", credit_card_desc, recommend_rate, apply_rate, apply_speed, create_at, color, tag, bonus, apply_num, banner, use_bonus, thumb_l, tel, banner_index, jump_url, sort, status, real_apply_num, partner_id, free_day, avg_quota, avg_apply_num, year_fee, free_fee_times, bill_day, apply_need, pass_rate, need_query, background, work_day, school_url, type, nuclear_card, open_url from tp_bank
select tp.id,tp.name,tp.thumb from tp_user_bank t LEFT JOIN tp_bank tp on t.bank_id = tp.id where t.user_id = #{user_id}
